name: Sturgeon v. Apollo Oil & Gas Company
name_abbreviation: Sturgeon v. Apollo Oil & Gas Co.

judges: Before McCollum, C. J., Dean, Fell, Mestrezat and Potter, JJ.
parties: Sturgeon v. Apollo Oil & Gas Company

opinions.text:
Opinion by
Mr. Justice Dean,
This is an appeal from the same decree as that from which the Apollo Oil & Gas Company also appealed, opinion handed down this day. What we have said in that case disposes of this appeal. The decree of the court below is affirmed.
opinions.author: Mr. Justice Dean,

casebody.head_matter:
Sturgeon v. Apollo Oil & Gas Company
(No. 3).
Argued March 4, 1902.
Appeal, No. 25, Oct. T., 1902, by defendant, L. T. Yoder, from decree of C. P. No. 1, Allegheny County, March T., 1900, No 522, on bill in equity in case of George A. Sturgeon v. Apollo Oil & Gas Company, Limited, L. T. Yoder and S. W. Yandersaal.
Before McCollum, C. J., Dean, Fell, Mestrezat and Potter, JJ.
Affirmed.
October 13, 1902:
